member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO
member.summary: Elements of the TF_DA_ATTR_INFO enumeration are used to specify text conversion data in the structure.

member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO.TF_ATTR_INPUT
member.summary: The text is entered by the user and has not been converted yet.

member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO.TF_ATTR_TARGET_CONVERTED
member.summary: The user has made a character selection and the text has been converted yet.

member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO.TF_ATTR_TARGET_NOTCONVERTED
member.summary: The user made a character selection, but the text is not converted yet.

member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO.TF_ATTR_INPUT_ERROR
member.summary: The text is an error character and cannot be converted. For example, some consonants cannot be put together.

member.name: TF_DA_ATTR_INFO.TF_ATTR_FIXEDCONVERTED
member.summary: The text is not converted. Theses characters will no longer be converted.
